title: Fully Upgraded | Private Pool | Vacant | Furnished
description: D&B Properties is pleased to offer for Sale this award-winning converted 4 Bedroom in the well sought after district of Saheel in the golf community of Arabian Ranches 1. This home has been featured in Mojeh Magazine, Better Homes, Ontario Design Guide and has won an award with Commercial Interior Design. The interiors boast 4000sq. ft of built up area with an additional 500sq. ft. of outdoor cabana space. The newly landscaped prime property is situated on an 8,609 sq. ft. plot and features a multi-level pool, sunk-in fire pit with seating area and a cabana with a fully equipped outdoor kitchen.Appliances include a pizza oven, built in bbq, cooktop and undercounter fridge. All new window frames, exterior painting and landscaping has been completed in Q4 of 2022. The property can be offered with a fully furnished option.
